original_text: The king said, ‘You have said enough about this. I have decided that you and Ziba will share the fields that belonged to your grandfather, Saul.’
korean_text: 왕이 그에게 이르되 네가 어찌하여 또 네 일을 말하느냐 내가 이르노니 너는 시바와 밭을 나누라 하니

sentences.original_text: You have said enough about this
that you and Ziba will share the fields
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 시바가 그 밭을 나눌 것이라고

sentences.original_text: that belonged to your grandfather, Saul
